New Records: LeBron James scored a career-high 563rd 30-point game, breaking Michael Jordan's record.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 30 points to help the Lakers to a 119-102 victory over the Atlanta Hawks.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed humility after the game, mentioning that being mentioned with the greats like Michael Jordan is'super-duper dope for me.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis returned from a one-game absence with an ankle problem to claim 18 points and 19 rebounds for LA.
Austin Reaves had 20 points as the Lakers won their seventh game out of their last nine.
